title: Juana and the Dragonewt’s Seven Kingdoms, Vol. 1
description: HERE THERE BE DRAGONEWTSIn a fantastical future ruled by dragonewts, human dominance is a thing of the past. Despite humanity’s extinction, Nid, a young dragonewt with a passion for ancient history, makes a startling discovery: a young human girl who calls herself Juana. Together, the unlikely pair sets out to explore the strange world of the Seven Kingdoms.
author: Kiyohisa Tanaka
